welcomeScreen.title: Discover Your Perfect Nail Shape
welcomeScreen.description: Take this quick quiz to find the ideal nail shape that complements your personality, style, and lifestyle.
welcomeScreen.intro: Our professional recommendation system will guide you through a series of questions to match you with one of 8 elegant nail shapes.

resultScreen.title: Your Perfect Nail Shape!
resultScreen.description: Based on your answers, we recommend:

nailShapes.Almond_description: Elegant and sophisticated, the almond shape elongates fingers and adds a touch of classic glamour, perfect for a refined look.
nailShapes.Square_description: Strong and modern, square nails offer a clean, crisp edge that's both practical and stylish, ideal for those who prefer a bold, structured aesthetic.
nailShapes.Squoval_description: The best of both worlds, squoval nails combine the strength of square with the softness of oval, offering a versatile and universally flattering shape.
nailShapes.Coffin_description: Dramatic and chic, coffin (or ballerina) nails are tapered with a flat tip, exuding confidence and a high-fashion appeal for the trendsetter.
nailShapes.Stiletto_description: Bold and edgy, stiletto nails are sharply pointed, making a powerful statement and creating the illusion of extra-long, slender fingers.
nailShapes.Oval_description: Classic and graceful, oval nails are soft and feminine, flattering most hand shapes by elongating fingers with a gentle, rounded curve.
nailShapes.Round_description: Simple and practical, round nails are low-maintenance and durable, perfect for those who prefer a natural look and active lifestyle.
nailShapes.Ballerina_description: Similar to coffin but often slightly more tapered, ballerina nails are elegant and sophisticated, offering a chic, elongated look with a flat, squared-off tip.
